players.name: Alice
memory: Bob: "I'm shocked by the sudden turn of events and I believe we need to stay focused and work together as a team to figure out what happened last night. Let's try to gather all the information we can and share any suspicions or concerns we may have."
Diana: "I agree with Bob, let's work together to uncover the truth. Based on my investigation last night, I believe Alice is the mafioso."

Diana: "I still strongly believe that Alice is the mafioso based on my investigation last night. It's important that we continue to work together and share any information or suspicions we may have in order to uncover the truth."
You: "I understand your concerns, but I want to assure you that I'm not the mafioso. I have no reason to harm Charlie or any of you. Let's work together and find out who the real mafioso is."
